lead_paragraph: Politicians boycotting the presidential election denounced the president on Wednesday after a vote in which only one candidate — the incumbent — stood for office.
snippet: Politicians boycotting the presidential election denounced the president on Wednesday after a vote in which only one candidate — the incumbent — stood for office.

headline.main: Opposition Calls Election in Burundi a ‘Masquerade’
headline.print_headline: Opposition Calls Election In Burundi a ‘Masquerade’
